wikipedia_page.main: Willie Simpson Coburn (30 April 1941 – 5 December 2015) was a Scottish footballer who played much of his career with St Johnstone and also played for Forfar Athletic and Cowdenbeath.Coburn joined St Johnstone from Crieff Earngrove juniors in 1962 and went on to make 238 appearances for the Perth club before leaving in 1972 for Forfar Athletic.Coburn died on 5 December 2015 at the age of 74.

response: *5 December: Willie Coburn, 74, St Johnstone, Forfar and Cowdenbeath defender.
*Willie Coburn, 74, Scottish footballer (St Johnstone).Former Player Willie Coburn passes away
